isPairedEndFormat

public static boolean isPairedEndFormat(java.lang.String fileToCheck)
Returns true if the given SAM file is in paired end format (has the mateLine) attribute. Will also check the file with the default extension.

Parameters:

Returns:

getPairedEndFile

public static java.lang.String getPairedEndFile(java.lang.String fileToCheck)
Returns the file itself or the file plus the default PAIRED_END_EXTENSION if either is in paired end format. If neither is in paired end format, returns null.

Parameters:
fileToCheck -
Returns:
